thread.title: Bill Belichick has to keep repainting his boat to keep up with his Super Bowl rings
thread.title_full: Bill Belichick has to keep repainting his boat to keep up with his Super Bowl rings

author: Molly Podlesny
title: Bill Belichick has to keep repainting his boat to keep up with his Super Bowl rings
text:
This must be getting expensive.
Bill Belichick redid his boat in 2015, and he’s already got to change it again.
Bill Belichick renamed & repainted his boat this summer. It looks stunning. #VIRings pic.twitter.com/ZI10pFCwAG 
— Only In Boston (@OnlyInBOS) July 17, 2015 This is his boat, VI Rings. Now, it’s going to have to be called VII Rings, which was not missed by the reporters at the Super Bowl.
Bill Belichick said he's working on changing the name of his boat to VII Rings "right now." #Patriots #SuperBowl pic.twitter.com/Oa6O1NLng4 
— Jim McBride (@globejimmcbride) February 6, 2017 They asked, but he was ready for the question.
"When will you change the name of your boat to "VII Rings?" question sparks this smile from Bill Belichick. pic.twitter.com/QsBDyG1qae 
— Mike Reiss (@MikeReiss) February 6, 2017 Look at him smile, thinking of all the rings.
Here, Bill, we’ve already designed VII Rings for you, right here.
You’re welcome. But really, Bill, have you ever thought about naming it something else so you don’t have to keep repainting it? Infinity Rings? Super Boat? Bill Boatichick? Just a thought.
